prereq.p: Ensure that you have an active account in MyPack portal and log into it before proceeding with the task

context.p: Under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA), students have the right to restrict access to their personal information which includes email addresses, enrollment statuses, and field of study

step.cmd: Select Privacy Restrictions from the left-hand menu
Select Restrict under the directory field that must be restricted or select Clearto release the restriction from that field

postreq.p: Select Full Privacy Blockto prevent us from sharing your personal information with anyone, including employers, and inclusion from graduation and Dean's list publications
To grant exceptions for certain publications, click the Full Privacy Blockfield, check Restrcited and select the exceptions to be granted in Exceptions
